<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get credit balance for project</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v2/projects/{projectId}/machine-translation-credit-balance"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns machine translation credit balance for specified project
